sql.query: select monmail_fromusrid||'-'||usr1.usr_fname||' '||usr1.usr_lname, monmail_tousrid||'-'||usr2.usr_fname||' '||usr2.usr_lname,monmail_fromflowpoint,monmail_toflowpoint, to_char(monmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'),mon_type, monmail_fromusrid, monmail_tousrid from monmailbox,users usr1,users usr2 where monmail_fromusrid=usr1.usr_id and monmail_tousrid=usr2.usr_id and monmailbox.monmail_mmrno='^' order by monmail_date

select mmr.mmr_cbsid, to_Char(monmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'), monmail_fromusrid, mmr.mmr_month, mmr.mmr_year, org_name, monmail_cbsname, mmr_orgscode, mmr.mmr_no,mmr_rptholder from monmailbox a,mon_monthlyreport mmr, organisations where org_scode=mmr.mmr_orgscode and a.monmail_date=(select max(b.monmail_date) from monmailbox b where b.monmail_mmrno=a.monmail_mmrno) and a.monmail_tousrid= mmr.mmr_rptholder and a.monmail_mmrno=mmr.mmr_no and mmr.mmr_rptholder='^' and mmr.mmr_status!='C' order by monmail_date desc

select DBC_CBSID,DBC_ACCNO from mon_dbc a,MON_PERSONALINFO b,organisations org where DBC_DATE is not null and DBC_AMOUNT is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(DBC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 0 and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(DBC_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 90 and a.DBC_CBSID=b.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=b.personal_solid and org.org_scode='^'

select LC_cbsid,LC_LCNumber from mon_lc lc,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where LC_STATUS !='E' and LC_LCOPENDATE is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(LC_LCOPENDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 30 and lc.LC_cbsid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and org.org_scode='^'

select org_name, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, city_name, org_state, state_name, org_zip, org_phone from mon_limitregister, laps_cities, organisations, laps_states where org_city=city_code(+) and state_code(+)=org_state and limit_solid=solid and limit_cutaccno='^'

select limit_cutaccno,limit_sanctamt,to_char(limit_sanctdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as limit_sanctdate ,limit_margin,limit_roi,limit_facility, to_char(limit_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as limit_reviewdate,limit_sancrefno,limit_sancauth,to_char(limit_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as limit_expirydate, limit_type,limit_remarks,limit_modifiedby,to_char(limit_modifieddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as limit_modifieddate from mon_limitregister where limit_custid='^'

select pi.postins_no, mpi.personal_custname, org.org_name, pi.postins_status, usr.usr_fname, to_char(pim.postins_date,'dd/mm/yyyy'), pi.postins_type from postinspection_mailbox pim, postinspection pi, mon_personalinfo mpi, organisations org, users usr where usr.usr_id=pim.postins_fromusrid and pim.postins_date=(select max(b.postins_date) from postinspection_mailbox b where b.postins_no=pim.postins_no) and pim.postins_no= pi.postins_no and org.org_scode=pi.postins_orgscode and mpi.personal_cbsid=pi.postins_cbsid and pi.postins_status='P' and pi.postins_holder='^'
select mon_flowpoint,wrk_flowname,mon_maxclass,mon_function from mon_workflow,workflow where mon_workid=wrk_flowid and mon_code='^' and wrk_flowtype='^' order by wrk_flowid

select mon_flowpoint, mon_workid,mon_maxclass,mon_duration,wrk_flowname,mon_function from mon_workflow,workflow where mon_workid=wrk_flowid and mon_code='^' and wrk_flowtype='^' order by mon_flowpoint
delete mon_workflow where mon_code=? and mon_workid in (select wrk_flowid from workflow where wrk_flowtype=?)
select mon_flowpoint,wrk_flowname,mon_maxclass,mon_function from mon_workflow,workflow where mon_code='^' and mon_workid=wrk_flowid and wrk_flowtype in ('^','^') order by wrk_flowid

select app_no,comapp_companyname,comapp_companyid, npamail_fromuser as sname,TO_CHAR(npamail_senddate,'DD/MM/YYYY') from npamail a, applications,com_demographics,comapplicant,users where npamail_appno = app_no and app_no = demo_Appno and demo_comappid=comapp_id and usr_id = npamail_touser and upper(app_status) = 'CA' and npamail_touser ='^' and npamail_senddate =(select max(npamail_senddate) from npamail b where a.npamail_appno = b.npamail_appno)

select org_name,count(npa_loanno) as npa_no,sum(npa_principal) as npa_principal,sum(npa_interest) as npa_interest from com_proposals,applications,organisations ,npa_loandetails where prop_appno=app_no and app_orgcode = org_code and npa_loanno=app_no and prop_sectordetails like 'Y%' and upper(org_level) ='R' and npa_maxdrg != '0' group by org_name

select org_name,count(npa_loanno) as npa_no,sum(npa_principal) as npa_principal,sum(npa_interest) as npa_interest from com_proposals,applications,organisations ,npa_loandetails where prop_appno=app_no and app_orgcode = org_code and npa_loanno=app_no and prop_sectordetails = '' and upper(org_level) ='R' and npa_maxdrg != '0' group by org_name
select sum(npa_outstanding) AS npaout,org_name from npa_loandetails,applications,organisations where npa_loanno=app_no and org_code=app_orgcode and npa_outstanding >0 group by org_name
delete npa_workflow where npa_code=? and npa_workid in (select wrk_flowid from workflow where wrk_flowtype=?)
select npa_workid,npa_maxclass,npa_duration,wrk_flowname,npa_function from npa_workflow,workflow where npa_code='^' and npa_workid=wrk_flowid and wrk_flowtype='^' order by npa_flowpoint
select ins_policyno, ins_coveramt, to_char(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_expirydate, ins_clause from insurance_register where INS_ACCOUNTNO='^' and INS_CBSID='^'
select ins_coveramt,to_char(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_expirydate from insurance_register where ins_policyno='^' and ins_cbsid='^'

insert into insurance_register(ins_seqid, ins_cbsid, ins_security, ins_company, ins_policyno, ins_clause, ins_coveramt, ins_premiumamt, ins_paid_by, ins_beneficiary, ins_duedate, ins_risk, ins_details, ins_covernote, ins_policydate, modified_by, modified_date, ins_expirydate, ins_riskfactor, ins_insuredaddr1, ins_insuredaddr2, ins_insuredaddr3,ins_insuredcity, ins_insuredstate, ins_insuredpincode) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select FIL_SNO,FIL_NATURE_FACILITY,FIL_AMOUNT,FIL_RATEOFINTERST,FIL_SECURITY,TO_CHAR(FIL_DATEOFDOCUMENT,'DD/MM/YYYY')as FIL_DATEOFDOCUMENT, stat_data_desc1 from FILINGSOFSUIT_LIMITSANCTIONED, static_data where APP_NO='^' and stat_data_id(+)='36' and trim(FIL_NATURE_FACILITY)=stat_data_desc order by FIL_SNO
select count(monmail_fromflowpoint) from monmailbox where monmail_mmrno='^' and monmail_fromflowpoint=^
select sno,reason from monthly_monitor_info where borrower_id=^ and month_date=TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and tabname = '^' and ^ order by sno
delete from monthly_monitor_info where borrower_id = ? and month_date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') and tabname = ? and sno in (?)

update monthly_monitor_info set reason = ?,month_date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where borrower_id = ? and sno = ? and tabname=? and description = ?
select NVL(max(sno),0)+1 from monthly_monitor_info where borrower_id=^
select to_char(max(month_date),'DD/MM/YYYY') from monthly_monitor_info where borrower_id = ^ and tabname='^'
select MON_ACCWISEACCOUNTNO from mon_accountwisedetails where ACCTWISE_CBSID='^' and mon_year='^' and mon_month='^'
insert into mon_assetclassification(alertfor, daysfrom, daysupto, assetclassification)values(?,?,?,?)
select alertfor, daysfrom, daysupto, assetclassification from mon_assetclassification where alertfor='^' and assetclassification='^'
delete from mon_assetclassification where alertfor=? and assetclassification=?

select ins_cbsid,ins_accountno from INSURANCE_REGISTER a ,mon_assetclassification where ins_expirydate is not null and alertfor='^' and assetclassification='^' and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto

insert into mon_workflow(mon_code, mon_flowpoint, mon_workid, mon_maxclass, mon_duration, mon_function) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)

select count(npamail_fromflowpoint) from npamailbox where npamail_appno='^' and npamail_fromflowpoint=^

select * from npaworkactions where npa_groupid=^

select * from npaworkactions where npa_groupid=^ and npa_workaction is not null and npa_workclass is not null and npa_workclass !=0
select nvl(max(secu_sno),0)+1 as secu_sno from npa_securities where secu_appno='^' and npa_module_type='^'

insert into npa_securities(secu_appno, secu_sno, secu_securities_type, secu_nature, secu_renew_valuedate, secu_renew_valueamount, secu_present_valuedate, secu_present_valueamount, secu_present_inspecdate, secu_present_inspectedby, npa_module_type) values(?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)

update npa_securities set secu_securities_type=?, secu_nature=?, secu_renew_valuedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), secu_renew_valueamount=?, secu_present_valuedate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), secu_present_valueamount=?, secu_present_inspecdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), secu_present_inspectedby=? where secu_appno=? and secu_sno=? and npa_module_type=?
delete npa_securities where secu_appno=? and secu_sno=? and npa_module_type=?

select to_char(date_documents,'dd/mm/yyyy') as date_documents,document_complete,documents_det, to_char(date_certification,'dd/mm/yyyy')as date_certification, documents_enforce, balance, complaint_rec, complaint_received, complaint_disposal from sarfaeri2 where app_no='^'

insert into sarfaeri2(app_no, date_documents, document_complete, documents_det, date_certification, documents_enforce, balance, complaint_rec, complaint_received, complaint_disposal)values (?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?)
delete from SARFAERI2 where app_no=?

delete from SETLEMENT where app_no=?

insert into SETLEMENT2(app_no, set_briefhis, set_intfrom_date, set_intto_date, set_legal2, set_totaldue) values (?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)
delete from SETLEMENT2 where app_no=?

insert into compromisepage3(APP_NO, SECURITIES_PARTICULARS, SECURITIES_VALUE, MEANS_PARTICULARS, MEANS_VALUE, MARKETABILITY_PARTICULARS, MARKETABILITY_VALUE, NPA_PARTICULARS, NPA_VALUE, LEGALPOSITION_PARTICULARS, LEGALPOSITION_VALUE, NETSCORE, NETSCORE_POINTS, LEDGER_DATE, RUNNING_LEDGER1, RUNNING_LEDGER2, UNRECOVERED1, UNRECOVERED2, NETDUES1, NETDUES2, DUMMYLEDGER_FROM, DUMMYLEDGER_TO, UNAPPLIED_INTEREST1, UNAPPLIED_INTEREST2, LEGAL_EXPENSES1, LEGAL_EXPENSES2, TOTAL_DUES1, TOTAL_DUES2, SETTLEMENT_AMT1, SETTLEMENT_AMT2, SACRIFICE1,SACRIFICE2, WRITE_OFF1, WRITE_OFF2, WAIVER1, WAIVER2, ABSORPTION1, ABSORPTION2, STAFF_ACCOUNTABILITY, ZONAL_RECOMMENDATIONS) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select SECURITIES_PARTICULARS, SECURITIES_VALUE, MEANS_PARTICULARS, MEANS_VALUE, MARKETABILITY_PARTICULARS, MARKETABILITY_VALUE, NPA_PARTICULARS, NPA_VALUE, LEGALPOSITION_PARTICULARS, LEGALPOSITION_VALUE, NETSCORE, NETSCORE_POINTS, to_char(LEDGER_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as LEDGER_DATE,RUNNING_LEDGER1, RUNNING_LEDGER2, UNRECOVERED1, UNRECOVERED2, NETDUES1, NETDUES2, to_char(DUMMYLEDGER_FROM,'dd/mm/yyyy')as DUMMYLEDGER_FROM, to_char(DUMMYLEDGER_TO,'dd/mm/yyyy')as DUMMYLEDGER_TO, UNAPPLIED_INTEREST1, UNAPPLIED_INTEREST2, LEGAL_EXPENSES1, LEGAL_EXPENSES2, TOTAL_DUES1, TOTAL_DUES2, SETTLEMENT_AMT1, SETTLEMENT_AMT2, SACRIFICE1, SACRIFICE2, WRITE_OFF1, WRITE_OFF2, WAIVER1, WAIVER2, ABSORPTION1, ABSORPTION2, STAFF_ACCOUNTABILITY, ZONAL_RECOMMENDATIONS from COMPROMISEPAGE3 where APP_NO='^'
UPDATE FILINGSOFSUIT_LIMITSANCTIONED SET FIL_NATURE_FACILITY=?,FIL_AMOUNT=?,FIL_RATEOFINTERST=?,FIL_SECURITY=?, FIL_DATEOFDOCUMENT=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') WHERE APP_NO=? and FIL_SNO=?

delete from FILINGSOFSUIT_LIMITSANCTIONED where APP_NO=? and FIL_SNO=?

UPDATE FILINGSUIT_TERM SET FIL_TERM_NAME=?,FIL_SEL_TERMTYPE=?,FIL_NO_INSTALMENTS=?,FIL_INS_AMOUNTS=?,FIL_START_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),FIL_LAST_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), FIL_DISBURSE_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),FIL_REGNAMENOINSTALMENT_REC=?,FIL_AMOUNT_INSRECEIVED=?,FIL_INSTALMENT_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),FIL_PAYMENT_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') WHERE APP_NO=? and FIL_SNO=? and NPA_MODULE=?

insert into FILINGSUIT_TERM(APP_NO,CUST_ID,FIL_SNO,FIL_TERM_NAME,FIL_SEL_TERMTYPE,FIL_NO_INSTALMENTS, FIL_INS_AMOUNTS,FIL_START_DATE,FIL_LAST_DATE,FIL_DISBURSE_DATE,FIL_REGNAMENOINSTALMENT_REC,FIL_AMOUNT_INSRECEIVED, FIL_INSTALMENT_DATE,FIL_PAYMENT_DATE,NPA_MODULE)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?)
delete from FILINGSUIT_TERM where APP_NO=? and FIL_SNO=? and NPA_MODULE=?

SELECT APP_NO,CUST_ID,FIL_SNO,FIL_TERM_NAME,FIL_SEL_TERMTYPE,FIL_NO_INSTALMENTS, FIL_INS_AMOUNTS,to_char(FIL_START_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as FIL_START_DATE,to_char(FIL_LAST_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as FIL_LAST_DATE,to_char(FIL_DISBURSE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as FIL_DISBURSE_DATE,FIL_REGNAMENOINSTALMENT_REC,FIL_AMOUNT_INSRECEIVED, to_char(FIL_INSTALMENT_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as FIL_INSTALMENT_DATE,to_char(FIL_PAYMENT_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as FIL_PAYMENT_DATE,NPA_MODULE FROM FILINGSUIT_TERM WHERE APP_NO='^' and NPA_MODULE='^' ORDER BY FIL_SNO

select ORG_NAME,FUND_OVERDUEAMT,PERSONAL_CUSTNAME,fund_custid,FUND_OSAMT, fund_accno,FUND_SCHEMECODE,FUND_OVERDUETYPE,fund_sancamt, FUND_DRAWINGPOWER,prd_desc, FUND_OVERDUESINCE from (select rownum row_num,ORG_NAME,FUND_OVERDUEAMT,PERSONAL_CUSTNAME,fund_custid,FUND_OSAMT, fund_accno,FUND_SCHEMECODE,FUND_OVERDUETYPE,fund_sancamt, FUND_DRAWINGPOWER,stat_data_desc1 as prd_desc, to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FUND_OVERDUESINCE from MON_FUNDBASED fun,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org,static_data where stat_data_desc= FUND_SCHEMECODE and fun.fund_custid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=fun.fund_solid and org.solid=per.personal_solid and stat_data_id='36' and FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null ^ and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and FUND_OVERDUETYPE='^' and FUND_OVERDUEAMT ^ 0 and FUND_OSAMT ^ FUND_SANCAMT and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto ^

select ORG_NAME,FUND_OVERDUEAMT,PERSONAL_CUSTNAME,fund_custid,FUND_OSAMT, fund_accno,FUND_SCHEMECODE,FUND_OVERDUETYPE,fund_sancamt, FUND_DRAWINGPOWER,prd_desc, FUND_OVERDUESINCE from (select rownum row_num,ORG_NAME,FUND_OVERDUEAMT,PERSONAL_CUSTNAME,fund_custid,FUND_OSAMT, fund_accno,FUND_SCHEMECODE,FUND_OVERDUETYPE,fund_sancamt, FUND_DRAWINGPOWER,stat_data_desc1 as prd_desc, to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FUND_OVERDUESINCE from MON_FUNDBASED fun,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org,static_data where stat_data_desc= FUND_SCHEMECODE and stat_data_id='36' and fun.fund_custid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=fun.fund_solid and org.solid=per.personal_solid and FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null ^ and alertfor='002' and mon.assetclassification='^' and FUND_OVERDUETYPE='^' and FUND_OVERDUETYPE is not null and FUND_SCHEMECODE is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto ^

select ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, fund_overdueamt, limit_expirydate, ASSETCLASSIFICATION,prd_desc, limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from (select rownum row_num, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, fund_overdueamt, to_char(limit_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as limit_expirydate, ASSETCLASSIFICATION, stat_data_desc1 as prd_desc, limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon, mon_personalinfo per, mon_fundbased fund, organisations org, static_data, MON_LIMITREGISTER where fund.fund_accno=limit_cutaccno and fund.fund_custid=limit_custid and fund.fund_solid=limit_solid and limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and STAT_DATA_DESC = LIMIT_FACILITY and org.solid=limit_solid and org.solid=per.personal_solid and LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and stat_data_id='36' and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and limit_accflag='^' and limit_expirydate is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(limit_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(limit_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto ^

select ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, fund_overdueamt, ASSETCLASSIFICATION, prd_desc, FUND_OVERDUESINCE,limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from (select rownum row_num,ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, fund_overdueamt, ASSETCLASSIFICATION,stat_data_desc1 as prd_desc,to_char(mmr_insvisitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FUND_OVERDUESINCE,limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon,mon_personalinfo per, mon_fundbased fund, organisations org, static_data,MON_LIMITREGISTER, mmr_inspectionreport where fund.fund_accno=limit_cutaccno and fund.fund_custid=limit_custid and fund.fund_solid=limit_solid and limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and STAT_DATA_DESC = LIMIT_FACILITY and LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and stat_data_id='36' and mmr_insvisitdate is not null and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and limit_accflag='^' and limit_expirydate is not null and mmr_cbsid=limit_custid and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(mmr_insvisitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(mmr_insvisitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto and org.solid=limit_solid and org.solid=per.personal_solid and mmr_month=(select max(to_number(mmr_month)) from mmr_inspectionreport where mmr_cbsid=per.personal_cbsid) and mmr_year=(select max(to_number(mmr_year)) from mmr_inspectionreport where mmr_cbsid=per.personal_cbsid) ^

select a, b, sum(countrow) as totalcount , sum(FUND_OSAMT) as OSAMT from (select alertfor a,assetclassification b, count(fund_custid) as countrow,sum(FUND_OSAMT) as FUND_OSAMT from MON_FUNDBASED fun,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon where fun.fund_custid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and FUND_OVERDUEAMT ^ 0 and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) -to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) -to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto ^ group by alertfor,assetclassification having alertfor ='001'
UNION all
select alertfor a,assetclassification b, count(fund_custid) as countrow,sum(FUND_OSAMT) as FUND_OSAMT from MON_FUNDBASED fun,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon where fun.fund_custid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and FUND_ACCSTATUS ='D' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and alertfor='001' and mon.assetclassification='002' and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(fund_dormantsince,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(fund_dormantsince,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto ^ group by alertfor,assetclassification having alertfor ='001'
UNION all
select alertfor a,assetclassification b, count(LIMIT_CUSTID) as countrow, sum(BILLS_BILLAMT) as FUND_OSAMT from MON_LIMITREGISTER,mon_personalinfo per, mon_bills fun,organisations org, MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon where LIMIT_CUTACCNO = BILLS_ACCNO and fun.BILLS_CBSID=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and BILLS_BILLDUEDATE is not null and BILLS_OVERDUEAMT ^ 0 and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) -to_date(to_char(BILLS_BILLDUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) -to_date(to_char(BILLS_BILLDUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto ^ group by alertfor,assetclassification having alertfor ='001'
UNION all
select '001' as a,assetclassification b, count(fund_custid) as countrow,sum(FUND_OSAMT) as FUND_OSAMT from MON_FUNDBASED fun,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon where fun.fund_custid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and FUND_OVERDUEAMT ^ 0 and FUND_OSAMT ^ FUND_SANCAMT and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto ^ group by alertfor,assetclassification having alertfor ='002'
UNION all
select alertfor a,assetclassification b, count(fund_custid) as countrow, sum(FUND_OSAMT) as FUND_OSAMT from MON_FUNDBASED fun,mon_personalinfo per,organisations org, MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon where fun.fund_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and fun.FUND_SCHEMECODE in ('DL011','DL012','DL002','DL003','DL004') and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))- to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))- to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto ^ group by alertfor,assetclassification having alertfor ='001'
UNION all
select alertfor a,assetclassification b, count(limit_custid) as countrow, 0 as FUND_OSAMT from MON_LIMITREGISTER,mon_personalinfo per,organisations org, MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon where limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and limit_expirydate is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) -to_date(to_char(limit_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) -to_date(to_char(limit_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto ^ group by alertfor,assetclassification having alertfor ='003'
UNION all
select alertfor a,assetclassification b, count(limit_custid) as countrow, 0 as FUND_OSAMT from MON_LIMITREGISTER,mon_personalinfo per,organisations org, MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon,mmr_inspectionreport where limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and mmr_cbsid=limit_custid and mmr_insvisitdate is not null and limit_expirydate is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) -to_date(to_char(mmr_insvisitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) -to_date(to_char(mmr_insvisitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^= daysupto and org.solid=per.personal_solid and mmr_month=(select max(to_number(mmr_month)) from mmr_inspectionreport where mmr_cbsid=per.personal_cbsid) and mmr_year=(select max(to_number(mmr_year)) from mmr_inspectionreport where mmr_cbsid=per.personal_cbsid) ^ group by alertfor,assetclassification having alertfor ='004'
) group by a, b

select ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, fund_overdueamt, prd_desc, limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from (select rownum row_num, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, fund_overdueamt, stat_data_desc1 as prd_desc, limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from mon_personalinfo per, mon_fundbased fund, organisations org, static_data, MON_CHECKLIST a, mon_limitregister where fund.fund_accno=limit_cutaccno and fund.fund_custid=limit_custid and fund.fund_solid=limit_solid and limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and CBS_ACCNO=LIMIT_CUTACCNO and org.solid=limit_solid and org.solid=per.personal_solid and STAT_DATA_DESC =LIMIT_FACILITY and LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and stat_data_id='36' and mon_dbcdate is not null and mon_dbcamount is not null and limit_accflag='^' and months_between(to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(mon_dbcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')) ^ 12 ^

select ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, prd_desc, limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from (select rownum row_num, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, stat_data_desc1 as prd_desc, limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from mon_personalinfo per, mon_fundbased fund, organisations org, static_data, MON_CHECKLIST a, mon_limitregister where fund.fund_accno=limit_cutaccno and fund.fund_custid=limit_custid and fund.fund_solid=limit_solid and limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and STAT_DATA_DESC=LIMIT_FACILITY and CBS_ACCNO=LIMIT_CUTACCNO and org.solid=limit_solid and org.solid=per.personal_solid and MON_EQUITABLE is not null and MON_EQUITPERFECT is not null and LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and stat_data_id='36' and limit_accflag='^' and upper(MON_EQUITABLE)='Y' and upper(MON_EQUITPERFECT)='N' ^

from( select 005 as a,003 as b, count(limit_custid) as countrow from mon_personalinfo per,mon_limitregister, MON_CHECKLIST a,organisations org where limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and CBS_ACCNO(+)=LIMIT_CUTACCNO and PERSONAL_CONSTITUTION in ('005','006') and (mon_roc is null or mon_roc='n') ^

select 005 as a,003 as b, count(limit_custid) as countrow from mon_personalinfo per, mon_limitregister,MON_DOCUMENTREGISTER, organisations org where limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and DOC_CBSID=PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and DOC_APPLICANTYPE is not null and DOC_SIGNED is not null and upper(DOC_APPLICANTYPE) = 'GUA' and upper(DOC_SIGNED)='N' ^
union all
select 005 as a,003 as b, count(limit_custid) as countrow from mon_personalinfo per,mon_limitregister, MON_CHECKLIST,organisations org where limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and CBS_ACCNO=LIMIT_CUTACCNO and org.solid=per.personal_solid and MON_EQUITABLE is not null and MON_EQUITPERFECT is not null and upper(MON_EQUITABLE)='Y' and upper(MON_EQUITPERFECT)='N' ^
union all
select 005 as a,004 as b,COUNT(limit_custid) as countrow from mon_personalinfo per, INSURANCE_REGISTER,MON_LIMITREGISTER,organisations org where limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=per.personal_solid and ins_cbsid = PERSONAL_CBSID and INS_EXPIRYDATE is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) -to_date(to_char(INS_EXPIRYDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') > 0 ^
union all
select 005 as a,004 as b, COUNT(limit_custid) as countrow from mon_personalinfo per,MON_LIMITREGISTER mon,INSURANCE_REGISTER,MON_SECURITYREGISTER b, organisations org where limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and per.personal_cbsid=ins_cbsid and org.solid=per.personal_solid and monsec_accountnumber=ins_accountno and INS_COVERAMT ^ MONSEC_VALUATAMOUNT ^
union all
select 005 as a,004 as b,COUNT(limit_custid) as countrow from MON_DOCUMENTREGISTER DOC, mon_personalinfo per, MON_LIMITREGISTER, organisations org where limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and DOC_EXECUTEDDATE is not null and DOC_DATEVETTED is null and doc.doc_cbsid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))- to_date(to_char(DOC_EXECUTEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 30 and org.solid=per.personal_solid ^) group by a, b

select ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, fund_overdueamt, prd_desc,limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from (select rownum row_num,ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_CUSTNAME, LIMIT_FACILITY, LIMIT_SANCTAMT, fund_osamt, fund_overdueamt, stat_data_desc1 as prd_desc,limit_cutaccno, limit_accflag from mon_personalinfo per, mon_fundbased fund, organisations org, static_data, MON_DOCUMENTREGISTER DOC,MON_LIMITREGISTER mon where fund.fund_accno=limit_cutaccno and fund.fund_custid=limit_custid and fund.fund_solid=limit_solid and limit_custid=PERSONAL_CBSID and STAT_DATA_DESC=LIMIT_FACILITY and mon.LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and stat_data_id='36' and DOC_EXECUTEDDATE is not null and DOC_DATEVETTED is null and doc.doc_cbsid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and limit_accflag='^' and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(DOC_EXECUTEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 30 and org.solid=mon.limit_solid and org.solid=per.personal_solid and DOC_DELFLAG='N' ^

select distinct to_char(npa_application.npa_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as createddate,npa_application.npa_appno as appno, npa_application.npa_processedby as processedby,to_char(npa_application.npa_processeddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processeddate, organisations.org_name as orgname,users.usr_fname as createdby,npa_demographics.npa_democbsid as cbsid, cbs_npabasic.cbsnpa_custname as appname FROM NPA_APPLICATION,ORGANISATIONS,USERS,NPA_DEMOGRAPHICS,CBS_NPABASIC where ^ and (npa_application.npa_status='^' or npa_application.npa_status='^') and npa_application.npa_moduletype='^' and organisations.org_code=npa_application.npa_orgcode and users.usr_id=npa_application.npa_createdby and npa_demographics.npa_demoappno=npa_application.npa_appno and cbs_npabasic.cbsnpa_custid=npa_demographics.npa_democbsid order by npa_application.npa_appno

select distinct to_char(npa_application.npa_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as createddate,npa_application.npa_appno as appno, npa_application.npa_processedby as processedby,to_char(npa_application.npa_processeddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as processeddate, organisations.org_name as orgname,users.usr_fname as createdby,npa_demographics.npa_democbsid as cbsid, cbs_npabasic.cbsnpa_custname as appname FROM NPA_APPLICATION,ORGANISATIONS,USERS,NPA_DEMOGRAPHICS,CBS_NPABASIC where ^ and (npa_application.npa_status='^' or npa_application.npa_status='^') and npa_application.npa_moduletype='^' and organisations.org_code=npa_application.npa_orgcode and users.usr_id=npa_application.npa_createdby and npa_demographics.npa_demoappno=npa_application.npa_appno and cbs_npabasic.cbsnpa_custid=npa_demographics.npa_democbsid and (to_date(to_char(npa_application.npa_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy')) order by npa_application.npa_appno

select personal_custname, suit.suit_no, suit.suit_decreeamount, to_char(suit.suit_dateofdecree,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateofdecree, to_char(suit.suit_dateoffilling,'dd/mm/yyyy') as suit_dateoffilling, suit.suit_presentposition from npa_statusSuitfield suit, npa_demographics demo, mon_personalinfo pers, npa_application app, organisations org WHERE pers.personal_cbsid= demo.npa_democbsid and demo.npa_demoappno=suit.appno and ^ and suit.appno=app.npa_appno and app.npa_orgcode= org.org_code and ^ order by org_name, personal_custname

select PRE_AMOUNT,to_char(npagen_npasince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_npa_sincedate ,decode(bifr_account,'1','Yes','2','No') as bifr_account ,to_char(ref_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as ref_date, to_char(sta_demandnoticedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_demandnoticedate, to_char(sta_positionnoticedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as sta_positionnoticedate ,personal_custname,pre_accno ,pre_running_outstand from npa_generalinfo a,NPA_PRESENTPOSITION b,npa_statusnotepage2 c,npa_STATUSNOTEPAGE21 d, npa_statuspagesarfaesia1 e,npa_application f,organisations org ,mon_personalinfo pers,npa_demographics h where a.NPAGEN_APPNO=b.PRE_APPNO and b.PRE_APPNO=c.APPNO and c.APPNO=d.APPNO and d.APPNO=e.STA_APPNO and f.npa_appno=e.STA_APPNO and b.PRE_APPNO= h.npa_demoappno and pers.personal_cbsid= h.npa_democbsid and ref_date is not null and org_code= f.npa_orgcode ^

select count(*) as count1 from npa_application where ^ and npa_moduletype='^'

select count(*) as count1 from npa_application where ^ and npa_moduletype='^' and (to_date(to_char(npa_application.npa_createddate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') between to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'))
select sum(pre_amount) as amount from NPA_PRESENTPOSITION where pre_appno='^'

select branchname,accountnumber,customername, facilitynature , sanctionedamount, outstanding, overdueamount, overduesince, accounttype,BRANCHCODE, alertfor, assetclassification from (select rownum as row_num, branchname,accountnumber,customername, facilitynature , sanctionedamount, outstanding, overdueamount, overduesince, accounttype,BRANCHCODE, alertfor, assetclassification from (select rownum as row_num, branchname, accountnumber,trim(customername) as customername, facilitynature , sanctionedamount, outstanding, overdueamount, overduesince, accounttype,BRANCHCODE, decode(alertfor,'001','Loan default','003','Non Renewal', '004','Non Inspection','005','Document','006','Other') as alertfor , decode(assetclassification,'001','standard','002','EAS1','003','Eas2','004','SMA') as assetclassification from ANNEXURETB1 where FINAL_ASSETCLASS='^' and ACCOUNTTYPE='^' ^

select count(*) as cnt,sum(outstanding) as outstandingamt,final_alertfor alertfor, final_assetclass assetclassification from ANNEXURETB1 where ^ and accounttype='^' GROUP by final_alertfor, final_assetclass

select npamail_tousrid as tousrid,to_char(npamail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as maildate from npamailbox where to_char(npamail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') = (select max(to_char(npamail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss')) from npamailbox where npamail_appno='^')

select personal_custname,tlr_cbsid, to_char( tlr_renewal,'dd/mm/yyyy') as reviewdue,to_char(tlr_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as reviewon, reviewedby, orgname, to_char(tlr_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as review_processdate from (select row_num, personal_custname,tlr_cbsid, tlr_renewal, tlr_createdate, reviewedby, orgname, tlr_processdate from (select rownum as row_num, personal_custname,tlr_cbsid, tlr_renewal ,tlr_createdate , usr.usr_fname as reviewedby,orgs.org_name as orgname,tlr_processdate from tlr_applications a, mon_personalinfo b, organisations org, users usr, organisations orgs, tlr_generaldetails gdet where gdet.tlr_appno=a.tlr_appno and b.personal_cbsid=a.tlr_cbsid and orgs.org_code = usr.usr_orgcode and upper(a.tlr_status) in (^) and ^

select mmr_cbsid, personal_custname, usr_fname as username, reportdate, orgname from (select row_num, mmr_cbsid, personal_custname, usr_fname, reportdate, orgname from (select rownum as row_num, mmr_cbsid, personal_custname, usr_fname, to_char(a.monmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as reportdate, org.org_name as orgname from mon_monthlyreport ,mon_personalinfo , organisations orgs, monmailbox a, users, organisations org where personal_cbsid=mmr_cbsid and a.monmail_date=(select max(b.monmail_date) from monmailbox b where b.MONMAIL_MMRNO=a.MONMAIL_MMRNO) and a.MONMAIL_MMRNO=mmr_no and usr_id=monmail_tousrid and org.org_code=usr_orgcode and mmr_status='P' and mmr_orgscode=orgs.org_scode ^

select mmr_cbsid, personal_custname, mmr_usrid, mmr_status, usr_fname as username, to_char(mmr_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as reportdate, orgname from (select row_num, mmr_cbsid,personal_custname,mmr_usrid,mmr_status,usr_fname, mmr_createdate, orgname from (select rownum as row_num, mmr_cbsid, personal_custname, mmr_usrid, mmr_status, usr_fname, mmr_createdate, org.org_name as orgname from mon_monthlyreport, mon_personalinfo, organisations orgs, users, organisations org where personal_cbsid=mmr_cbsid and usr_id=mmr_usrid and org.org_code=usr_orgcode and mmr_status='O' and mmr_orgscode=orgs.org_scode ^
